content.question: Which of the following pairs accurately identifies the methods used by Congress and the president to hold the bureaucracy accountable to the other branches?

choices.label: CongressPresidentHolding a committee hearingAppointing a Cabinet
CongressPresidentUsing the power of the purse to control spendingNegotiating a treaty
CongressPresidentFiring civil servantsExercising power as commander in chief
CongressPresidentMeeting in a congressional caucusAttaching a signing statement to legislation

content.answer: CongressPresidentHolding a committee hearingAppointing a Cabinet
